C

checkContinentIsConnectedSubgraph(ArrayList<Continent>) - Method in class controller.ValidateMap
This method takes list of continents as a parameter and check if all the countries within that continent is internally connected.
checkCountryAndContinent(ArrayList<Country>, ArrayList<Continent>) - Method in class controller.ValidateMap
This method checks if every continent has at least one country
checkTheWinner() - Method in class controller.PlayerController
This method is used to check if one player owns all the countries of the map and hence can be declared as the winner of the game.
clearNegotiatedPlayerList() - Method in class controller.PlayerController
This method is used to clear all the individual players' negotiated players list after each round of issuing and execution of orders.

Continent - Class in model
This Class is for all the Continents of the Map
Continent(String, int) - Constructor for class model.Continent
This is the Constructor of the class which stores the ID Name and ContinentControl Value to that Continent Object It also initializes the CountryList which later stores all the countries belonging to that particular continent
controller - package controller
 
Country - Class in model
This is a class for all the countries/territories.
Country(String, String) - Constructor for class model.Country
This is the constructor of the class with stores the name of country and its respective continent name The Id is generated Statically, also initializes an arraylist which will later hold all the neighboring countries
